```java
private void fastRemove(int index) {
    modCount++;
    int numMoved = size - index - 1;
    if (numMoved > 0)
        System.arraycopy(elementData, index+1, elementData, index,
                         numMoved);
    elementData[--size] = null; // clear to let GC do its work
}
```

```java
private void fastRemove(int index) {
    modCount++;
    int numMoved = size - index - 1;
    if (numMoved > 0)
        System.arraycopy(elementData, index+1, elementData, index,
                         numMoved);
    elementData[--size] = null; // clear to let GC do its work
}
```

## Actions

**Actions** ,Actions

``` yaml
name: Make RaspberryPi Kernel

on:
  push:
    tags: 
      - 'v*' # Tagv

env:
  USE_SSH_CONFIG: true # ssh true: false:

jobs:
  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-18.04

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: pull RaspberryPi Kernel linux
        run: |
          cd ../
          git clone https://github.com/raspberrypi/linux.git
      - name: pull RaspberryPi Kernel Tool
        run: |
          cd ../
          git clone https://github.com/raspberrypi/tools.git
      - name: Move .config
        if: env.USE_SSH_CONFIG == 'false'
        run: |
          cp .config ../linux
      - name: Setup Debug Session # SSHActions
        if: env.USE_SSH_CONFIG == 'true'
        uses: csexton/debugger-action@master
      - name: Make
        run: |
          cd ../
          export WORKPATH=$(pwd)
          export PATH=$PATH:$WORKPATH/tools/arm-bcm2708/gcc-linaro-arm-linux-gnueabihf-raspbian-x64/bin
          export PATH=$PATH:$WORKPATH/tools/arm-bcm2708/arm-bcm2708-linux-gnueabi/bin
          cd linux/
          make ARCH=arm CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf- zImage modules dtbs -j8
      - name: Create Release
        id: create_release
        uses: actions/create-release@master
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TOKEN }} # GitHubToken
        with:
          tag_name: ${{ github.ref }} # (tag)
          release_name: Release ${{ github.ref }}
          draft: false # 
          prerelease: false # 
      #  ReleasetgzRelease
      - name: build TAR PACKAGE
        run: |
          tar -czvf raspberrypi-kernel.tar.gz ../linux/arch/arm/boot
      - name: Upload Release Asset
        id: upload-release-asset
        uses: actions/upload-release-asset@master
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.TOKEN }}
        with:
          upload_url: ${{ steps.create_release.outputs.upload_url }} # Release
          asset_path: ./raspberrypi-kernel.tar.gz # 
          asset_name: raspberrypi-kernel.tar.gz # 
          asset_content_type: application/gzip


```

- `.config`Actions`USE_SSH_CONFIG``false`
- `Actions``.config``USE_SSH_CONFIG``true`

pull`.config`

```shell
git tag -a v1.0 -m 'build kernel'
git push origin v1.0
```

```shell
tar -zxvf libfastcommon.tar.gz && cd libfastcommon-1.0.43/ && ./make.sh && ./make.sh install
```



## fastDFS

### 

```shell
tar -zxvf fastdfs.tar.gz && cd fastdfs-6.06/ && ./make.sh && ./make.sh install
```
> fastDFS`/etc/fdfs/`4
>
> - client.conf.sample	fastDFS
> - storage.conf.sample
> - storage_ids.conf.sample    storage1
> - tracker.conf.sample


### Tracker

`/etc/fdfs/``Tracker`

```shell
cd /etc/fdfs/ && cp tracker.conf.sample tracker.conf
```



`tracker.conf``base_path`

```shell
base_path=/data/fastdfs/tracker
```



```shell
mkdir -p /data/fastdfs/tracker
```





```shell
#Tracker
service fdfs_trackerd start

#Tracker
service fdfs_trackerd stop

#
systemctl enable fdfs_trackerd
```



### Storage

`/etc/fdfs/``Storage`

```shell
cd /etc/fdfs && cp storage.conf.sample storage.conf
```



`storage.conf`

```shell
base_path=/data/fastdfs/storage

#
store_path0=/data/fastdfs/file

#tracker
tracker_server=172.16.54.137:22122
```





```shell
mkdir -p /data/fastdfs/storage && mkdir -p /data/fastdfs/file
```





```shell
#Storage
service fdfs_storaged start

#Storage
service fdfs_storaged stop

#
systemctl enable fdfs_storaged
```



###

```shell
#
cd /etc/fdfs && cp client.conf.sample client.conf
```



`client.config`

```shell
base_path=/data/fastdfs/client

#tracker
tracker_server=172.16.54.137:22122
```





```shell
mkdir -p /data/fastdfs/client
```





```shell

#
group1/M00/00/00/rBA2iV6yvU2AEXUfAAACGTXt3Kw94.yaml
```

## 

1. `telnet`QQ`smtp`

   ```shell
   telnet smtp.qq.com 25
   
   # 
   Trying 183.3.225.42...
   Connected to smtp.qq.com.
   Escape character is '^]'.
   220 newxmesmtplogicsvrsza5.qq.com XMail Esmtp QQ Mail Server.
   ```

2. `EHLO`` ESMTP ` `EHLO`  `ESMTP` 

   ```shell
   EHLO smtp.qq.com
   
   # 
   250-newxmesmtplogicsvrsza5.qq.com
   250-PIPELINING
   250-SIZE 73400320
   250-STARTTLS
   250-AUTH LOGIN PLAIN
   250-AUTH=LOGIN
   250-MAILCOMPRESS
   250 8BITMIME
   ```

3. `AUTH``AUTH LOGIN``Base64`QQ****

   ```shell
   AUTH LOGIN
   // base64`Username:`
   $ 334 VXNlcm5hbWU6  
   
   // base64`Password:`
   $ 334 UGFzc3dvcmQ6
   
   # 
   235 Authentication successful
   ```

4. `MAIL` `MAIL FROM` 

   ```shell
   MAIL FROM:<211019847@qq.com>
   
   # 
   250 OK.
   ```

5. `RCPT` `RCPT TO` 

   ```shell
   RCPT TO:<573419235@qq.com>
   
   # 
   250 OK
   ```

6. `DATA``.`

   ```shell
   DATA
   
   # 
   354 End data with <CR><LF>.<CR><LF>.
   ```

7. 

   ```shell
   FROM: 211019847@qq.com
   TO: 573419235@qq.com
   SUBJECT: shell email
   
   this is body msg!
   .
   ```

8. `QUIT`

   ```shell
   QUIT
   
   # 
   221 Bye.
   Connection closed by foreign host.
   ```

   

`573419235@qq.com`**shell email**,

*this is body msg!*

Post._content:
RocketMQ();



## 

- JDK1.8
- Centos7



## -

- centos7_1 :172.16.54.130
- centos7_2 :172.16.54.128



## 

- JDK1.8 :https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html
- RocketMQ4.5.2 :http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/apache/rocketmq/4.5.2/rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release.zip



## JDK

  JDK1.8



## RocketMQ

  RocketMQ:

  ```shell
# unzip rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release.zip
  ```

### 

  RocketMQ:

```properties
# 
brokerClusterName=rocketmq-cluster

#brokermasterslave
brokerName=broker-a

#0  Master>0  Slave
brokerId=0 

#ip
brokerIP1 = IP

#nameServer
namesrvAddr=IP:9876;IP:9876

#topic 
defaultTopicQueueNums=4

# Broker Topic 
autoCreateTopicEnable=true

# Broker  
autoCreateSubscriptionGroup=true

#Broker  
listenPort=10911

# 4
 deleteWhen=04

# 48  
fileReservedTime=120

#commitLog1G 
mapedFileSizeCommitLog=1073741824

#ConsumeQueue30W
mapedFileSizeConsumeQueue=300000

#
diskMaxUsedSpaceRatio=88

#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/store/checkpoint

#Broker 
#- ASYNC_MASTER Master
#- SYNC_MASTER Master
#- SLAVE 
brokerRole=ASYNC_MASTER

#
#- ASYNC_FLUSH 
#- SYNC_FLUSH  flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
#checkTransactionMessageEnable=false

#abort 
abortFile=/usr/javawork/apache-rocketmq/store/abort

# maxMessageSize=65536
```

RocketMQconf

- 2m-2s-async :2master2slaveasync
- 2m-2s-sync :2master2slavesync
- 2m-noslave :2master,slave

async

#### centos7_1

> masterslave

##### broker-a.properties

```properties
brokerClusterName=DefaultCluster
brokerName=broker-a
brokerId=0
deleteWhen=04
fileReservedTime=48
brokerRole=ASYNC_MASTER
flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
listenPort=10911
#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/master/store/checkpoint
```

*1091110909,10912*

##### broker-a-s.properties

```properties
brokerClusterName=DefaultCluster
brokerName=broker-a
brokerId=1
deleteWhen=04
fileReservedTime=48
brokerRole=SLAVE
flushDiskType=ASYNC_FLUSH
namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
listenPort=20911
#
storePathRootDir=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store
#commitLog  
storePathCommitLog=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/commitlog
#
storePathConsumeQueue=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/consumequeue
#
storePathIndex=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/index
#checkpoint 
storeCheckpoint=/usr/local/rocketmq/slave/store/checkpoint
```

*2091120909,20912*



#### centos7_2

##### centos7_1brokerNamebroker-b



## RocketMQJVM()

> RocketMQ8G

  rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release/binrunbroker.shrunserver.sh

- runbroker.sh

```properties
JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms8g -Xmx8g -Xmn4g"


JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms512m -Xmx512m -Xmn256m"
```

- runserver.sh: 

```properties
JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms4g -Xmx4g -Xmn2g -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m"


JAVA_OPT="${JAVA_OPT} -server -Xms512m -Xmx512m -Xmn256m -XX:MetaspaceSize=128m -XX:MaxMetaspaceSize=320m"
```



## RocketMQ

> RocketMQ
>
> ```shell
> # service firewalld stop
> ```
>
> 

  rocketmq-all-4.5.2-bin-release/bin

- namesrv

```shell
# nohup sh mqnamesrv &
```

- broker-master

```shell
# nohup sh mqbroker -c ../conf/2m-2s-async/broker-a.properties &
```

- broker-slave

```shell
# nohup sh mqbroker -c ../conf/2m-2s-async/broker-a-s.properties &
```

*broker-c*



## Console

  Consolehttps://github.com/apache/rocketmq-externalsgit

```shell
# git clone https://github.com/apache/rocketmq-externals.git
```



```shell
# cd rocketmq-externals-master/rocketmq-console
```



```shell
# vim src/main/resources/application.properties
```

namesvrip

```properties
rocketmq.config.namesrvAddr=172.16.54.128:9876;172.16.54.130:9876
```



```shell
# mvn sprint-boot:run
```

Post.title: SpringCloudSpring-security-oauth
Post._content:
## 

OAuth2.0tokenredisclientMysql



- Redis
- Mysql

Mysql[Spring-security-oauthSql](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-security-oauth/blob/master/spring-security-oauth2/src/test/resources/schema.sql)SQLSpring-security-oauth

```sql
-- client_idclient_secretsunline
insert into 
	oauth_client_details (client_id, client_secret, authorized_grant_types , autoapprove)
values 
	("sunline","	{bcrypt}$2a$10$G1CFd535SiyOtvi6ckbZWexQy.hW5x/I/fLBPiW/E4UmctCfKYbgG","password","true");
```

> client_secret`new BCryptPasswordEncoder().encode("sunline")``{bcrypt}`



## 



### pom

```java
<!--security-oauth-->
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.cloud</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-cloud-starter-oauth2</artifactId>
</dependency>
    
<!--redis-->
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
</dependency>
    
<!--mysql-->
<dependency>
    <groupId>mysql</groupId>
    <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
    <version>8.0.17</version>
    <scope>compile</scope>
</dependency>
```



### application.properties

```properties
#datasource
spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3307/grey_code?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&autoReconnect=true&serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai
spring.datasource.username=zmh
spring.datasource.password=zmh

#redis
spring.redis.host=127.0.0.1
spring.redis.port=6379


server.port=9991
server.servlet.context-path=/oauthServer
```
